entry.title: SEC Chair Gensler 'Disappointed' in Ripple Court Ruling on Retail Investors
entry.summary: The head of the U.S. securities regulator also spoke about SEC’s recent enforcement actions on the cryptocurrency markets.

entry.title: Coinbase CEO to Meet House Democrats, Discuss Crypto: Report
entry.summary: As part of the exchange’s bid for regulatory clarity, Brian Armstrong reportedly plans to meet the New Democrat Coalition.

entry.title: SEC Accepts Valkyrie Bitcoin ETF Proposal for Official Review
entry.summary: The financial services firm has adopted ‘BRRR’ as the ticker for its ETF, the second application after BlackRock to be accepted by the regulator.

entry.title: Malicious ChatGPT Clone WormGPT Used to Launch Email Attacks
entry.summary: Cybercriminals are launching sophisticated, personalized phishing attacks by exploiting generative AI.

entry.title: Elon Musk Aims For Unbiased AI With New x.AI Venture
entry.summary: The dogecoin-loving tech mogul who famously called for AI regulation to prevent human extinction now says he wants to create an uncensored chatbot.

entry.title: 'Unsubstantiated': Expert Refutes Greenpeace Bitcoin Mining Pollution Claims
entry.summary: An environmentally conscious fund manager says Bitcoin mining will actually clean up the atmosphere.

entry.title: Scammers Are Impersonating Decrypt—Please Don't Fall for It
entry.summary: Decrypt journalists will never ask you to sign a form or download files in exchange for coverage. Watch out for these warning signs.

entry.title: BlockFi CEO Knew About Shaky FTX Balance Sheet Before Collapse, Creditors Allege
entry.summary: Zac Prince reportedly told his management team to “get comfortable” with Alameda despite its massive exposure to FTT.

entry.title: AI Could Bring ‘The Biggest Bubble of All Time’, Says Stable Diffusion Creator
entry.summary: What could be worse than a cataclysmic collapse of the market for tulips or jpeg monkeys? The bursting of a hype-filled AI bubble, of course.

entry.title: Chainlink Launches Cross-Chain Protocol to Bridge Blockchains With Traditional Capital Markets
entry.summary: “CCIP will create a private-public dynamic that will unlock trillions of dollars for the cryptocurrency space,” says cofounder Sergey Nazarov.

entry.title: Congressman Says Americans Could Be the 'Losers' in the AI 'Social Experiment'
entry.summary: Rep. Adam Schiff backs AI regulation and calls the entertainment industry the "tip of the spear."

entry.title: Coinbase Still Faces Significant SEC Battle Despite Last Week's XRP Ruling: Analysts
entry.summary: Analysts at Berenberg Capital said the impact of Ripple's partial win in its battle against the SEC has had an exaggerated effect on Coinbase.

entry.title: Ripple Attorney Says XRP Court Ruling Could Bring US Banks Back as Clients
entry.summary: Ripple’s general counsel said that Ripple is betting on big clients using its services again.

entry.title: Reddit Moons Token Surges 104% as Kraken Hints at Potential Listing
entry.summary: The token underpins the bustling r/CryptoCurrency Reddit community.

entry.title: Super Bowl MVP Patrick Mahomes Launching New NFT Collection
entry.summary: Kansas City Chiefs star Patrick Mahomes' Museum of Mahomes brand will drop 15,000 digital collectibles this September.

entry.title: G20 Body Issues 9 Regulatory Recommendations to Rein in Crypto Industry
entry.summary: The FSB said it had taken into account events of the past year, including the collapse of FTX and Terra, in its newest recommendations.

entry.title: Bitcoin Funds See Largest Consecutive Weekly Buys Since 2021
entry.summary: With institutional investor interest picking up, Bitcoin continues to dominate activity, according to the latest CoinShares report.

entry.title: What Is Gnosis? How Decentralized Prediction Markets Work
entry.summary: While Gnosis itself serves as an open framework, prediction markets are realized in third-party dApps built on top the Gnosis Chain, such as Azuro, Omen, and Reality Card.

entry.title: $5 Million Token Grant Will Fuel ‘Decentralized AI’ Development
entry.summary: Projects can receive up to $100,000 in ICP tokens to build artificial intelligence tools using the Internet Computer Protocol.

entry.title: Aave’s Dollar-Pegged GHO Stablecoin Hits $2.5M Market Cap After Just 2 Days
entry.summary: Aave has launched a new dollar-pegged stablecoin on Ethereum that's backed by overcollateralized loans in the style of Maker's DAI.

entry.title: 1inch Token Hits 3-Month High Amid Surge in South Korean Trading Volumes
entry.summary: The native token powering the 1inch Network has seen a surge in trading volume on South Korean exchange Upbit.

entry.title: Crypto Wallet Provider Gnosis Launches Self-Custodial Visa Debit Card
entry.summary: The Gnosis Card lets you pay anywhere that Visa is accepted. And, they're letting other wallets copy their design.

entry.title: Crypto Exchange Binance Finalizes Bitcoin Lightning Network Integration
entry.summary: Binance customers can now withdraw and deposit funds via Bitcoin’s Layer-2 scaling solution, the Lightning Network.

entry.title: Aave Companies Launch V2 Lens, Introducing 'Blocking' to Crypto Social App
entry.summary: Lens Protocol launched its latest version of the crypto-powered social media protocol, adding several new functionalities to the platform.

entry.title: Ethereum Scaling Solution zkSync Unveils Latest Prover Tech ‘Boojum’
entry.summary: zkSync’s new prover plummets transaction time and the amount of expensive hardware needed for everyday users to help secure the network.

entry.title: Over 200 Ethscriptions Nabbed in Smart Contract Exploit
entry.summary: The protocol’s creator lauded victims as “the earliest adopters.”

entry.title: Judge in Coinbase Case Expresses ‘Skepticism’ Over SEC's Prior S-1 Approval
entry.summary: The Judge appeared to align herself with Coinbase, saying its S-1 may have some legal weight.

entry.title: Crypto Investment Continues Slide And ‘Has Not Yet Found a Clear Bottom’: Report
entry.summary: Despite more deals, venture funding for crypto and blockchain initiatives declined for the fifth straight quarter.

entry.title: Brazilian CBDC Allows Government to Freeze Funds, Developer Finds
entry.summary: Blockchain developer Pedro Magalhaes discovered the function and took to social media to demand answers from the central bank.

entry.title: This Week on Crypto Twitter: XRP Scores Courtroom Victory Against SEC, Cryptoverse Explodes
entry.summary: The universe gave crypto fans a lot to chew on this week. Some of it good, some of it outrageous, and all of it highly entertaining.

entry.title: Pharrell Is the Future of Fashion—And the Future Looks Creative AF
entry.summary: Louis Vuitton's embrace of a "non-traditional" creative director and NFTs points the way forward for fashion, despite the naysayers.

entry.title: Come for The Token, Stay for The Product. Right?
entry.summary: Failing to find product market fit, projects that launch a token too soon could become blind to ever finding their real user base.

entry.title: SEC Formally Accepts BlackRock Spot Bitcoin ETF Application for Review
entry.summary: The procedural move suggests that the federal agency will give the closely-watched application a serious look.

entry.title: Bitcoin Miners Face 'Stress Test' in Next Halving: JP Morgan
entry.summary: The price of Bitcoin and transaction fees will need to rise significantly to offset the lower block reward.

entry.title: Le Clu3 Brings NFT-Based Loyalty Perks to Private Banking
entry.summary: Crédit Agricole's Indosuez Wealth Management arm launches Le Clu3, a loyalty program aimed at high-end clientele.

entry.title: AI Emerges as a Common Enemy for Actors and Writers in Hollywood
entry.summary: The first joint strike in 63 years grinds productions to a halt over artificial intelligence and compensation.

entry.title: This Week in Coins: XRP Leads Alt Week as Solana, Cardano and Polygon Outperform Bitcoin and Ethereum
entry.summary: Ripple’s courtroom victory against the SEC was a win for holders of many leading altcoins this week.

entry.title: 'Space Mermaids' Is an Addictive Arcade-Style Game on XRP With NFT Rewards
entry.summary: PREVIEW: Players must dodge asteroids and collect stars as a pixelated mermaid in Space Mermaids, a retro-style game built on XRP.

entry.title: Spanish National Museum Thyssen to Mint Exclusive Collection of Van Gogh NFTs
entry.summary: Olyverse and Thyssen-Bornemisza National Museum partner to bring Van Gogh to the metaverse, offering art lovers a new kind of experience.

entry.title: Meta Goes All In on AI: Can It Compete With Google, ChatGPT and MidJourney?
entry.summary: Meta’s CM3leon model and a reported commercial version of LLaMA could upend the generative AI industry.

entry.title: Dr. Disrespect's 'Deadrop': Early Access Gameplay From Snapshot VI
entry.summary: Decrypt's Kate Irwin playtests Dr. Disrespect and Midnight Society's first-person shooter Deadrop and shares the latest game updates, as well as her opinions on the game in development. Currently, Deadrop offers Polygon Founders Pass NFTs with no other crypto plans revealed just yet.

entry.title: 'More and More' Game Publishers Will Embrace NFTs: Mythical Games CEO
entry.summary: In the wake of EA Sports and Fortnite creator Epic Games embracing Nike's NFT platform, Mythical Games CEO John Linden tells Decrypt's Andrew Hayward how quickly he expects to see more major traditional game publishers enter the blockchain space and how quickly the industry will scale.

entry.title: Gran Saga Unlimited Early Access: Inside the Anime MMORPG on Aptos
entry.summary: Decrypt's Kate Irwin plays Gran Saga: Unlimited's second community playtest, reports her findings, and offers her opinion and insights on the upcoming game, which will offer optional Aptos NFTs.

entry.title: 100 Thieves' Moe Says Blockchain Games Will 'Eventually' Be Accepted by Livestreamers
entry.summary: 100 Thieves content creator and gamer Moe also goes by "Yassuo" online after his favorite League of Legends character. Decrypt's Kate Irwin asks him about 100 Thieves' future crypto plans and whether Moe thinks creators like xQc and Pokimane might ever come around to blockchain games.

entry.title: "Games of the Future Are Going to Be Different," Says Splinterlands Cofounder
entry.summary: Splinterlands Cofounder Matt Rosen tells Decrypt's Kate Irwin about how the game has evolved over its five-year history and why he doesn't listen to the FUD around crypto.

entry.title: Inside Champions Ascension: Like 'For Honor' with NFTs?
entry.summary: Plai Labs Marketing Director Payton Kaleiwahea tells Decrypt's Kate Irwin about player response to the combat game Champions Ascension in development, which offers arena combat, raid bosses, AI landscape features, and more.

entry.title: Ex-Activision VP Michael Lee: Gaming Is Crypto's 'Killer App'
entry.summary: Former Activision Vice President Michael Lee is now the SVP of Growth at Matter Labs. At the 3XP gaming conference, Lee sat down with Decrypt's Kate Irwin to discuss crypto gaming and give his predictions for the industry.

entry.title: Behind the Scenes with AMGI Studios and My Pet Hooligan
entry.summary: Decrypt's Kate Irwin goes to Burbank, California for a behind-the-scenes tour of AMGI Studios, the developers of upcoming game My Pet Hooligan.

entry.title: Why Legend of Arcardia Chose Sui Over EVM Chains
entry.summary: Legend of Arcadia Executive Producer Andy Lee tells Decrypt's Kate Irwin about the game and why they switched from EVM to new protocol Sui.

entry.title: Rumble Racing Star Game Preview: Is This Mario Kart With NFTs?
entry.summary: Decrypt's Kate Irwin shares a first look at Delabs' upcoming lawn mower racing game Rumble Racing Star, which offers a large cast of quirky characters pulled from the worlds of Bored Ape Yacht Club, Pudgy Penguins, and more.

entry.title: Why Laguna Games Turned Down 'Game of Thrones' for Crypto Unicorns
entry.summary: Decrypt's Kate Irwin chats with Laguna Games about why the team chose to move away from an offer with WB Games to develop a Game of Thrones licensed title—and made Crypto Unicorns instead.

entry.title: Mythical Games CEO John Linden on NFL Rivals Topping 1M Downloads
entry.summary: Mythical Games just raised a $37 million Series C1 round on the back of the early success of NFL Rivals, which has already topped a million downloads in two months. Mythical CEO John Linden joins Decrypt's Andrew Hayward to discuss the launch and impact of NFL Rivals.

entry.title: How Ava Labs Is Approaching Gaming on Avalanche
entry.summary: At 3XP, Ava Labs Head of Gaming Ed Chang sat down with Decrypt's Kate Irwin to discuss some of the biggest Avalanche-based games on the horizon and how the company is approaching and thinking about Web3 gaming.

entry.title: Ogimi Founder David Gull on Why AI Should Be Your Meditation Coach
entry.summary: Ogimi founder David Gull speaks with Decrypt's Jason Nelson about its AI-driven meditation guides and how the technology can enable a more unique, custom-tailored meditation experience for users.

entry.title: VaynerSports Gaming VP Discusses Web3 Content Creators, Decentralized Streaming
entry.summary: Darren Glover, VP of Gaming at talent management agency VaynerSports, sat down with Decrypt's Kate Irwin at the 3XP expo to discuss the challenges faced by Web3-centric content creators, the current state of the esports market, and how decentralized streaming platforms can challenge centralized leaders like Twitch.

entry.title: NYXL Co-Founder on the State of Esports and Crypto Gaming
entry.summary: Rohit Gupta, co-founder of esports team NYXL, chats with Decrypt's Kate Irwin at the 3XP expo to discuss challenges faced by the esports industry and opportunities and experiments in Web3.

entry.title: What Is GameBridge? Inside Shrapnel's Gaming Innovation
entry.summary: Marc Mercuri, Head of Platform for Web3 shooter Shrapnel, speaks with Decrypt's Kate Irwin at the 3XP expo about GameBridge, a feature that simplifies blockchain item composability and interoperability.

entry.title: Gods Unchained Executive Producer Discusses Epic Games Store Move
entry.summary: Daniel Paez, Executive Producer on Immutable X-based card-battler Gods Unchained, discusses the long-running NFT game's launch on the Epic Games Store and the opportunity it provides.

entry.title: 'Play-to-Earn Is Not Dead. It Will Never Die' Says Words with Friends Creator Paul Bettner
entry.summary: Words With Friends and Wildcard Creator Paul Bettner tells Decrypt's Kate Irwin about his perspective on Axie Infinity and Web3 games.
